page.title: 13Canford Heath's growth.
page.content: The things that have changed. During the 12 years our families have lived in Canford Heath lots of changes have been made.The main thing is that people have done a lot of building on the heathland.We now have only half of the heathland left.In 1973 the council purchased a further 533 acres of land from Lord Wimborne to develop.They have built a large shopping area (INTERNATIONAL).Before this we had a Waitrose in Adastra Square but when International came it took all the custom and Waitrose closed down.After this Kwik Save replaced Waitrose.We have community facilities schools, shops and amenity areas.The heathland behind Verity Crescent used to be a good area for walks and children could catch newts in the big ponds but this has been destroyed by a motorway.
